i1.name: Leverage
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Renata's''' [[basic attack]]s apply a mark that lasts 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and expires when attacking a new enemy. If the enemy was unmarked, this also deals {{as|{{pp|key=%|1 to 3.5 for 11}}|health}} {{as|(+ 1% per 100 AP)}} {{as|of the target's {{sti|'''maximum''' health}}}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.

Allied {{tip|champions|champions'}} damaging attacks and abilities against marked targets consume the mark to deal {{as|{{pp|key=%|1 to 3.5 for 11}}|health}} {{as|(+ 1% per 100 AP)}} {{as|of the target's '''maximum''' health}} as {{as|additional '''bonus''' magic damage|magic damage}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Renata's basic attacks apply a mark that lasts 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and expires when attacking a new enemy. If the enemy was unmarked, this also deals 1% − 3.5 for 11% (based on level) (+ 1% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health bonus magic damage.
Allied champions' damaging attacks and abilities against marked targets consume the mark to deal 1% − 3.5 for 11% (based on level) (+ 1% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health as additional bonus magic damage.
Leverage's damage is capped at 150 against monsters.
i1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not block the mark's application.
** {{Pending for test}}: Interaction with mark consumption

q1.name: Handshake
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Renata''' fires a hook in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit and {{tip|root|roots}} them for 1 second, during which they are {{tip|standard sight|revealed}} but '''Renata''' is unable to declare attacks and has her {{as|movement speed}} '''reduced''' by {{as|30%|ms}}.
''Handshake'' can be recast while the target is rooted.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Renata''' {{tip|airborne|knocks}} the target in the target direction, though not through terrain, dealing the same damage to enemies they pass through. If the thrown target is a {{tip|champion}}, all secondary targets hit are {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Renata fires a hook in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and roots them for 1 second, during which they are revealed but Renata is unable to declare attacks and has her movement speed reduced by 30%.
Handshake can be recast while the target is rooted.
Recast: Renata knocks the target in the target direction, though not through terrain, dealing the same damage to enemies they pass through. If the thrown target is a champion, all secondary targets hit are stunned for 0.5 seconds.
q1.notes:
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} to the primary target and {{tip|area damage}} to secondary targets.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the hook but not the recast's effects as the primary target.
** As a secondary target, the recast's effects will be blocked.
* The recast cannot be used if the {{tip|root}} is not applied.
* '''Renata''' may still move while the hook is in flight.
* The {{stil|movement speed}} reduction stacks additively with other {{as|movement speed}} bonuses.
** It is a negative bonus, not a {{tip|slow}}, and is thus not reduced by {{tip|slow resist}}.
{{Effect at cast time start}}

w1.name: Bailout
description:
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Renata''' enhances herself or the target allied champion for 5 seconds, granting the target {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} in addition to {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while they are moving toward nearby {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champions and minions, both increasing in effectiveness by 100% over the duration.
''Bailout's'' duration resets whenever the target scores a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 6 seconds of damaging them.

If the target takes {{tip|death|fatal damage}} while ''Bailout'' is active, they are restored to {{as|100% of their '''maximum''' health}} but suffer a {{as|true damage}} burn equal to {{as|10% of their '''maximum''' health}} every {{rutngt|0.25}} until they die from reaching 0 health, during which ''Bailout's'' duration resets every {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
During this time, if they score a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 6 seconds of damaging them, the burn is stopped prematurely and they are set to {{as|20% of their '''maximum''' health}}. This effect may occur only ''once'' per application of ''Bailout'' while not already active on the target.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Renata enhances herself or the target allied champion for 5 seconds, granting the target bonus attack speed in addition to bonus movement speed while they are moving toward nearby visible enemy champions and minions, both increasing in effectiveness by 100% over the duration.
Bailout's duration resets whenever the target scores a takedown against an enemy champion within 6 seconds of damaging them.
If the target takes fatal damage while Bailout is active, they are restored to 100% of their maximum health but suffer a true damage burn equal to 10% of their maximum health every 0.264 until they die from reaching 0 health, during which Bailout's duration resets every 0.25 seconds.
During this time, if they score a takedown against an enemy champion within 6 seconds of damaging them, the burn is stopped prematurely and they are set to 20% of their maximum health. This effect may occur only once per application of Bailout while not already active on the target.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|10 to 30}}% {{as|(+ 1% per 100 AP)}}|Maximum Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|10*2 to 30*2}}% {{as|(+ {{ap|1*2}}% per 100 AP)}}}}
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|10 to 20}}% {{as|(+ 1% per 100 AP)}}|Maximum Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|10*2 to 20*2}}% {{as|(+ {{ap|1*2}}% per 100 AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
* Damage taken in excess of the fatal damage taken does not apply to the target's health after it was restored.
* The self-damage taken is considered {{tip|raw damage}} and is calculated based on the target's '''maximum''' health at the time of taking lethal damage.
* ''Bailout's'' bonuses will not reset in effectiveness if its duration is refreshed.
* ''Bailout'' takes priority over all {{tip|resurrection}} and {{tip|zombie state}} effects.
* ''Bailout'' will stop refreshing its duration while the target is burning after 250 seconds have elapsed.

effects.str:
• Bonus Attack Speed: % (+ 1% per 100 AP)
  • Maximum Bonus Attack Speed: % (+ % per 100 AP)
  • Bonus Movement Speed: % (+ 1% per 100 AP)
  • Maximum Bonus Movement Speed: % (+ % per 100 AP)

e1.name: Loyalty_Program
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Renata''' sends out chemtech rockets from either side of her that instantly strike targets around her. After {{rutngt|0.4}} they converge and travel to the target location as a single missile, striking targets along its path and exploding upon reaching the target location.
'''Renata''' and allies struck are granted a {{tip|shield}} for 3 seconds and enemies struck are dealt {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 30% for 2 seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Renata sends out chemtech rockets from either side of her that instantly strike targets around her. After 0.42900000000000005 they converge and travel to the target location as a single missile, striking targets along its path and exploding upon reaching the target location.
Renata and allies struck are granted a shield for 3 seconds and enemies struck are dealt magic damage and slowed by 30% for 2 seconds.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|65 to 185}} {{as|(+ 55% AP)}}}}
{{st|Shield Strength|{{ap|50 to 130}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}
e1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block either the rockets while they are in-flight or their explosion.
{{Effect at cast time start}}

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 55% AP)
  • Shield Strength: (+ 50% AP)

r1.name: Hostile_Takeover
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Renata''' launches a cloud of potent chemicals that travels in the target direction, granting {{tip|sight}} of its surroundings. Enemy champions and minions hit turn {{tip|berserk}} for a duration.

''Berserk'' units gain {{as|100% '''bonus''' attack speed}} and 25% increased [[size]]. In the search radius they prioritize attacking the closest unit of the following categories in decending order:
* their allied champions 
* allied non-champions
* allied {{tip|wards}}
* their usual enemies of all types.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Renata launches a cloud of potent chemicals that travels in the target direction, granting sight of its surroundings. Enemy champions and minions hit turn berserk for a duration.
Berserk units gain 100% bonus attack speed and 25% increased size. In the search radius they prioritize attacking the closest unit of the following categories in decending order: * their allied champions * allied non-champions * allied wards * their usual enemies of all types.
r1.notes:
:''See [[Types of Crowd Control#Berserk]] for specific details on Berserk.''
{{Effect at cast time end}}
